languages.text: {n}Цвет покидает лицо пилота.{/n} "Молодой господин... мертв?" {n}Несколько мгновений тягучей тишины женщина пытается осознать смысл случившегося.{/n} "Мне... мне надо забрать его тело. И... и доложить о трагедии. Б-благодарю, Ваша Светлость".

{n}The colour drains from the pilot's face.{/n} "The young lord... is... dead?" {n}For a few moments of drawn-out silence, she tries to make sense of what has happened.{/n} "I... I need to retrieve his body. And... and report the tragedy. Th-thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."
languages.original_text: {n}Цвет покидает лицо пилота.{/n} "Молодой господин... мертв?" {n}Несколько мгновений тягучей тишины женщина пытается осознать смысл случившегося.{/n} "Мне... мне надо забрать его тело. И... и доложить о трагедии. Б-благодарю, Ваша Светлость".

I need to retrieve his body. And... and report the tragedy. Th-thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}The colour drains from the pilot's face.{/n} "The young lord... is... dead?" {n}For a few moments of drawn-out silence, she tries to make sense of what has happened.{/n} "I... I need to retrieve his body. And... and report the tragedy. Th-thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

{n}The colour drains from the pilot's face.{/n} "The young lord... is... dead?" {n}For a few moments of drawn-out silence, she tries to make sense of what has happened.{/n} "I... I need to retrieve his body. And... and report the tragedy. Th-thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

languages.text: {n}飞行员的脸变得煞白。{/n}“年轻的勋爵……他……死了？”{n}她沉默了许久，似乎反应不过来到底发生了什么事情。{/n}“我……我得找回他的尸体，还……还要报告这场悲剧。谢谢您，大人。”
languages.original_text: {n}The colour drains from the pilot's face.{/n} "The young lord... is... dead?" {n}For a few moments of drawn-out silence, she tries to make sense of what has happened.{/n} "I... I need to retrieve his body. And... and report the tragedy. Th-thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}飞行员的脸变得煞白。{/n}“年轻的勋爵……他……死了？”{n}她沉默了许久，似乎反应不过来到底发生了什么事情。{/n}“我……我得找回他的尸体，还……还要报告这场悲剧。谢谢您，大人。”

languages.text: {n}La piloto palidece al instante.{/n} «¿El joven señor... ha... muerto?». {n}Tarda unos segundos en conseguir entender la situación.{/n} «De... Debo recuperar su cadáver. Y... y dar parte de la tragedia. Gra... gracias, mi{mf|lord|lady}».
languages.original_text: {n}The colour drains from the pilot's face.{/n} "The young lord... is... dead?" {n}For a few moments of drawn-out silence, she tries to make sense of what has happened.{/n} "I... I need to retrieve his body. And... and report the tragedy. Th-thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}La piloto palidece al instante.{/n} «¿El joven señor... ha... muerto?». {n}Tarda unos segundos en conseguir entender la situación.{/n} «De... Debo recuperar su cadáver. Y... y dar parte de la tragedia. Gra... gracias, mi{mf|lord|lady}».

languages.text: {n}操縦士の顔が青ざめる。{/n}「あのお方が…亡くなられた？」{n}長い沈黙が続いた後、彼女は何が起こったのかを理解しようとしていた。{/n}「私が…あのお方のご遺体を回収しなければ。そして…この悲劇の報告をしなければなりません。あ、ありがとうございます、陛下」
languages.original_text: {n}The colour drains from the pilot's face.{/n} "The young lord... is... dead?" {n}For a few moments of drawn-out silence, she tries to make sense of what has happened.{/n} "I... I need to retrieve his body. And... and report the tragedy. Th-thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}パイロットの顔が青ざめる。{/n}「若き主が…死んだ？」{n}しばらくの沈み込むような沈黙の間、彼女は何が起こったのかを理解しようとしていた。{/n}「私は…あの方の遺体を回収しなければ。そして…悲劇の報告を。あ、ありがとうございます、陛下」
{n}操縦士の顔が青ざめる。{/n}「あのお方が…亡くなられた？」{n}長い沈黙が続いた後、彼女は何が起こったのかを理解しようとしていた。{/n}「私が…あのお方のご遺体を回収しなければ。そして…この悲劇の報告をしなければなりません。あ、ありがとうございます、陛下」

languages.text: {n}La pilote blêmit.{/n} « Le jeune seigneur... est... mort ? » {n}Un long silence s'installe, pendant lequel elle tente de comprendre ce qu'elle vient d'apprendre.{/n} « Je... Je dois récupérer son corps et... rendre compte de cette tragédie. M-Merci, Votre Seigneurie. »
languages.original_text: {n}The colour drains from the pilot's face.{/n} "The young lord... is... dead?" {n}For a few moments of drawn-out silence, she tries to make sense of what has happened.{/n} "I... I need to retrieve his body. And... and report the tragedy. Th-thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}La pilote blêmit.{/n} « Le jeune seigneur... est... mort ? » {n}Un long silence s'installe, pendant lequel elle tente de comprendre ce qu'elle vient d'apprendre.{/n} « Je... Je dois récupérer son corps et... rendre compte de cette tragédie. M-Merci, Votre Seigneurie. »

languages.text: {n}Die Farbe weicht aus dem Gesicht der Pilotin.{/n} "Der junge Lord ... ist ... tot?" {n}Sie versucht einige Augenblicke des Schweigens lang, das Geschehene zu begreifen.{/n} "Ich ... Ich muss seine Leiche bergen. Und ... und diese Tragödie melden. D-Danke, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."
languages.original_text: {n}The colour drains from the pilot's face.{/n} "The young lord... is... dead?" {n}For a few moments of drawn-out silence, she tries to make sense of what has happened.{/n} "I... I need to retrieve his body. And... and report the tragedy. Th-thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Farbe weicht aus dem Gesicht der Pilotin.{/n} "Der junge Lord ... ist ... tot?" {n}Sie versucht einige Augenblicke des Schweigens lang, das Geschehene zu begreifen.{/n} "Ich ... Ich muss seine Leiche bergen. Und ... und diese Tragödie melden. D-Danke, Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}."

languages.text: {n}Pilotun yüzündeki kan çekiliyor.{/n} "Genç lordumuz... Öldü mü?" {n}O birkaç saniyelik gerginlik anında, olan biteni sindirmeye çalışıyor.{/n} "Şey... Naaşını almam lazım. Ayrıca... Acı haberi de merkeze bildirmeliyim. Sa... Sağ olun {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
languages.original_text: {n}The colour drains from the pilot's face.{/n} "The young lord... is... dead?" {n}For a few moments of drawn-out silence, she tries to make sense of what has happened.{/n} "I... I need to retrieve his body. And... and report the tragedy. Th-thank you, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pilotun yüzündeki kan çekiliyor.{/n} "Genç lordumuz... Öldü mü?" {n}O birkaç saniyelik gerginlik anında, olan biteni sindirmeye çalışıyor.{/n} "Şey... Naaşını almam lazım. Ayrıca... Acı haberi de merkeze bildirmeliyim. Sa... Sağ olun {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri."
